service3 module

Module that defines a Flask application for managing sales on the platform.

service3.api_get_customer_sales(customer_username)[source]

Retrieve sales transactions for a specific customer.

Parameters:

customer_username (str) – The username of the customer.

Returns:

A JSON response containing the customer’s sales or an error message.

Return type:

dict

service3.api_make_sale()[source]

Make a sale transaction for a customer.

Returns:

A JSON response indicating the status of the sale or any errors.

Return type:

dict
